metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45343 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In LibreCAD 2.2.0, a NULL pointer dereference in the HATCH handling of libdxfrw allows an attacker to crash the application using a crafted DXF document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45343` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.1.2-1ubuntu0.1
librecad-data - 2.1.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: eslerm> provided PoC still crashes program after applying patch

criterions.comment: librecad package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2-1ubuntu0.1').
